name: Magical Aptitude
text: You are skilled at spellcasting and using magic items.
benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Spellcraft checks and Use Magic Device checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
mythicText: Your understanding of the principles and intricacies of magic goes far beyond your training.
mythicBenefit: The bonus on Spellcraft and Use Magic Device skill checks from Magical Aptitude increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat a Spellcraft or Use Magic Device check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
text_zh: 你在释放魔法和使用魔法物品方面有资质。
benefit_zh: 你的法术辨识与使用魔法装置检定获得+2加值。如果某技能受训等级10以上，则对应的加值改为+4。
